about_the_game:
Cold Renegade is a low poly FPS with game modes like Deathmatch, Elimination, Team Deathmatch, Gun Game, Domination, and Zombie Wave Survival. Including mechanics like Killstreaks, Pre-Game Lobby, and Room Browser. You may have just found your time killing game.

Multiplayer

The next generation of PvP is here. Experience the most intense fight against real players and highly skilled artificial intelligence with a big variety of arsenal and gorgeous maps(coming soon). Choose a side or be a lone wolf, the choice is yours. Currently available in 5 game modes (DM, TDM, Domination, Elimination & Gun Game) with multiple maps, three teams and skins per team, with more coming soon!

CoOp

Fight along side your friends(I mean you do have them right?), in a zombie wave survival game mode or goof around in sandbox the choice is yours!

Single Player

Fight unending wave of zombies in the zombie wave survival game mode or test our your new loadout in sandbox.

Cold Renegade's Features

  • Multiplayer
  • Scoreboard
  • Voice Chat
  • Text Chat
  • Loadout System
  • Multiple game modes
  • Single Player
  • CoOp
  • Zombies!
  • KillStreaks
  • And much more!
And bugs, we will let you enjoy them until we fix them... Or call them a feature... it was one time! ONE TIME!
